Text: Ask Sooners IllustratedLets have it We want your questions about anything and everything surrounding Sooner sports Well take your questions such as When is Andre Woolfolk coming back and What happens to OUs BCS rating if Colorado beats Nebraska and Sooners Illustrated will answer your questions and send them back to everyone through our email list Injuries recruiting bowl possibilities the list is endless Well find the answers All you have to do is send your questions into to have the answers you are aching to know Include your name first last or whatever and your location and we might even print your questions in Sooners Illustrateds magazine We look forward to your questions Thanks and Boomer Sooner Sooners Illustrated
